title: Secure User Onboarding and Authentication
summary: Design and implement secure registration and authentication for customers
description: Develop a secure onboarding process that allows customers to register and authenticate within the banking application. This will involve implementing user registration with personal details, identity verification through OTP or biometric methods, password encryption, session management, and compliance with banking security protocols such as KYC and MFA. The aim is to ensure a seamless and safe access flow into the banking ecosystem.

title: Account Management and Overview
summary: Provide users with a comprehensive view of their bank accounts
description: Create a centralized account management system where users can view details about their linked bank accounts, balances, and transaction summaries. The interface should retrieve real-time data using secure APIs and display information in a clear, organized manner. Customers should also be able to manage multiple accounts (savings, current, loan) from a unified dashboard.

title: Fund Transfer and Payments Module
summary: Enable smooth inter-bank and intra-bank transactions
description: Implement functionality allowing customers to transfer funds both within the same bank and to external accounts. Include features such as adding beneficiaries, setting transaction limits, OTP verification, UPI integration, transaction receipts, and failed transaction handling. The module must follow strict security and regulatory standards for financial transactions.

title: Utility Bill Payments and Recharge Services
summary: Allow users to pay bills and top-up mobile or DTH services
description: Integrate payment options enabling users to pay electricity, water, mobile, internet, and credit card bills directly from the banking app. Include support for scheduled recurring payments, payment history viewing, and integration with third-party payment gateways. This will enhance user convenience and improve customer retention.

title: Loan and Credit Management
summary: Offer users the ability to view and manage their loans and credit facilities
description: Build a module to view, apply for, and manage loans or credit cards. Include EMI schedules, outstanding dues, interest rates, and repayment options. The system should support integration with credit bureaus for eligibility checks and allow users to apply for pre-approved credit digitally.

title: Transaction Analytics and Spending Insights
summary: Provide smart insights on user spending patterns and savings opportunities
description: Implement analytical tools that categorize transactions (e.g., food, travel, utilities) and provide visual insights into spending habits. Include monthly reports, savings tips, and expenditure alerts. Leverage AI to suggest personalized financial recommendations for better budgeting and investment planning.

title: Fraud Detection and Alert Systems
summary: Enhance security through AI-driven fraud detection
description: Develop machine learning models to detect unusual transaction patterns, suspicious logins, or high-risk activities. Create real-time alert mechanisms to notify users and the bankâ€™s security team about potential frauds. Ensure that flagged transactions are logged and managed through a secure internal review process.
